page.title: 14HOUSING IN WALSALL
page.content:
Housing in{Walsall}consists of a mixture of{Council,}private and locally based{Housing Association owned properties.
The first properties owned by the Council were built in{1919.}The Council now manages around{40,000 properties.
A recent survey found that{44%}of housing was{Council}owned,{49% owner {occupied}and{7%}run by{Housing {Associations.}There are a greater number of private houses in the south of Walsall particularly in areas such as Gorway, Mellish Road and Park Hall.
The survey also showed that there are now few houses without basic amenities such as a bath or inside toilet.
